Exaggerate: The claim may be seen as exaggerating the appointment of Okonjo-Iweala as the head of the WTO since her appointment has not yet been confirmed.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient support as it only mentions that several Nigerian media organizations, politicians, and celebrities have published posts claiming Okonjo-Iweala's appointment.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Okonjo-Iweala's appointment as the head of the WTO is a done deal, even though it has not been confirmed.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide alternative explanations for the opposition to Okonjo-Iweala's appointment by the United States delegation.
